name: S P H E R Y L Y S
name_original: S P H E R Y L Y S
description:
O B J E C T I V E

Collect bullets by allowing them to  hit the back of your ship.
Shoot bullets after you collect them, to destroy bullets for more points.
2 Points for collecting a bullet, 10 points for shooting one down.
You have 5 lives.

C O N T R O L S

Left and Right Arrows turn your ship.
Up Arrow fires a bullet.
Spacebar starts the game.

A B O U T

Just a quick little game I made for fun after watching some videos of old Atari games.
